duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinates the evaluation process of the defined patient population and assists in the development and management of processes related to pre-admission and post-discharge care transitions.
Supports patient access by serving as a liaison between the referring provider's office and Vanderbilt provider.
Interacts routinely and effectively with the clinical team to develop a collaborative plan for the coordination of patient care from the anchor hospitalization through the defined care episode.
Develops and manages relationships/clinical pathways with providers/agencies to optimize care for defined patient population.

Facilitates discharge/transition planning in collaboration with the multi-disciplinary team and coordinates handovers to outpatient care coordinators, home health care nurses, and other healthcare professionals.
Demonstrates reflective practice by constantly evaluating care coordination and supports the development of protocols for practice based on evidence.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field (Master's preferred)
